goals__remit: eLife is a non-profit initiative in research communication launched and supported by the Howard Hughes Medical Institute, the Wellcome Trust, and the Max Planck Society.  We run an open-access journal in life sciences and biomedicine and develop open-source infrastructure and digital products in support of open science.  Our mission is to help scientists accelerate discovery by operating a platform for research communication that encourages and recognises the most responsible behaviours in science.
